title: How do I detox from the mRNA vaccine?
description: Answer (1 of 9): The whole "Detox" thing is a HUGE scam meant to prey on people's insecurities either to sell you useless products or to manipulate you into supporting some nonsense policy. You don't have "pounds of rotting food" in your intestines. You can't leach toxins out of your body through...
